SalesAgreement.name: SalesAgreement
SalesAgreement.description: Represents a long-term agreement between a buyer and a seller to negotiate price and volume of products.

ActivatedDate.description: Date and time on which the sales agreement is activated.

ActualMarginPercentage.description: The total actual margin amount as a percentage of total actual amount.

ActualsCalculationMode.description: The mode used by the application to calculate actual quantities for a sales agreement.

AgreementType.description: This field is deprecated. We recommend not adding it to the page layout. Type of the sales agreement. Currently, a sales agreement is always volume-based.

ApprovedById.description: ID of the user who approves the sales agreement.

ApprovedDate.description: Date and time on which the sales agreement was approved.

CancellationDate.description: Date and time on which the sales agreement was canceled.

CancellationReason.description: Reason for canceling the sales agreement. Values can be customized. Examples include low profit, unavailability of products, and so on.

ContactId.description: ID of a contact associated with the sales agreement account.

DecimalScale.description: The number of decimal places applied to values in a sales agreement.

Description.description: User-defined context and information about the sales agreement.

EndDate.description: Date and time on which the sales agreement expires.

FutureActCalcSchedules.description: The number of future schedules to include in actuals calculations in the sales agreement.

LastActualsCalculatedDate.description: Date and time on which actuals were last calculated either by the automated daily job or by the ad-hoc action performed by an individual user.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: User-defined name of the sales agreement.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

PlannedMarginPercentage.description: The total planned margin amount as a percentage of total planned amount.

PriceAdjustmentScheduleId.description: The price adjustment schedule that's associated with the sales agreement. Available in API version 59.0 and later.

PricebookId.description: ID of the associated price book.

ProductLevel.description: Level of the products associated with the sales agreement.

ReferenceFieldId.description: The manufacturing program associated with the sales agreement. Available in API version 57.0 and later.

RenewedFromAgreementId.description: ID of the immediate parent from which the sales agreement is renewed.

RenewedToAgreementId.description: ID of the renewed sales agreement.

ScheduleCount.description: Number of schedules in the sales agreement.

ScheduleFrequency.description: Frequency at which schedules occur in the sales agreement.

ShouldUserSpecPlnQuantity.description: Indicates whether the user specifies the planned quantity of products in a sales agreement (true) or the initial planned quantity of each product is automatically distributed across all schedules (false).

StartDate.description: Date on which the sales agreement must get activated.

Status.description: Status of the sales agreement. The values can be customized but must map to at least one of the predefined status codes.

StatusCode.description: Set of five predefined status codes that determine at which stage is the sales agreement in.

TotalActualAgreementAmount.description: The sum of the total actual amounts across all products in a sales agreement.

TotalActualCostAmount.description: The sum of the total actual cost amounts across all products in a sales agreement.

TotalActualMarginAmount.description: The sum of the total actual margin amounts across all products in a sales agreement.

TotalAgreementAmount.description: Total value of the sales agreement.

TotalPlannedCostAmount.description: The sum of the total planned cost amounts across all products in a sales agreement.

TotalPlannedMarginAmount.description: The sum of the total planned margin amounts across all products in a sales agreement.

TotalProposedAgreementAmount.description: Total value of the sales agreement when the sales agreement is under revision.
